title: why is racism/paedophile comments tolerated by riot?
body: I just lost an honour rank for saying "dont be racist trash" and they dont get any penalty for talking about molesting children and saying ni**ger all game, okay riot, love the ideals

replies.body:
It feels weird that you would get banned for saying "don't be racist trash" alone. Would you like to share your chat logs and we can go over them?

Also just to echo Seras, two wrongs dont make a right. If you want to call out someone for being racist just say "Don't be racist" no need for the extra unneeded word. We definitely don't support racism or any abusive/offensive comments.

Abuse is abuse, doesn't matter who started it. He'll be judged on what he said and you'll be judged on what you said, independently of his behaviour.

You have no way of knowing they received no penalty.
Im glad to see riot supports that kind of behaviour and punishes players who speak up against it.
Hardly, all they demonstrated with this is that whey will not support or tolerate lesser abuse either.
You can thank the automated system for that.

I've received a chat ban for calling the enemy team player trash and garbage in a jokingly manner IN OUR OWN CHAT! That's how pathetic the automated system is! Someone gets butthurt or simply feels the need to report you (we all know how childish people can be in league) and BAM, notch one up for verbal abuse.

It really pisses me off how Riot and people alike try and defend this automated system when it has more holes in it than swiss cheese! It can't detect sarcasm, it can't differentiate between simple friendly banter and alike, i'm 99% certain it cannot detect who the comment was aimed at even if it was in your own team chat and about the enemy player as I pointed out above. Not to mention people will constantly come up with new slang words etc to abuse you with that won't be picked up by the automated system.

But whatever, this game is perfect, the banning system is perfect and I'm just a salty noob.
